title: Diamond Drops - Graceful Dangler Earrings
materials: 18K Yellow Gold (750 hallmark). Features high-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones with brilliant cut. Meticulously crafted with a Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: Delicate drop design, seamlessly integrating modern aesthetics. Features a succession of small, geometric gold sections linked together, punctuated with four-petal flower-like cubic zirconia settings. Secure post and butterfly closure for comfortable wear.
colors: Warm yellow gold complemented by the sparkling white of the CZ stones
creating a radiant and timeless color palette.
occasions: Perfect for both everyday elegance and special occasions. Ideal for a modern bride's Sangeet
or as a thoughtful gift for a loved one.
description: Lightweight and comfortable, these earrings offer a touch of sophistication without compromising on ease of wear. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance, while the CZ stones provide the look of diamonds at an accessible price point. A versatile piece that effortlessly transitions from day to night.
